mapper.select: select sr.id as roleId, sr.name as roleName FROM sys_user_role t left join sys_role sr on sr.id = t.role_id where t.user_id = #{userId} and sr.del_flag = false and sr.status = 1
select m.res_code from sys_role_menu t left join sys_menu m on m.id = t.menu_id where t.role_id = #{roleId} and m.status = 1 and m.del_flag = false
